input.name: CPI_infinitL2
input.description: thread i CPI when assuming infinit L2 cache, from model [7];

input.name: CPI_alone
input.description: Thread is CPI when running alone in a CMP system, from model [7];

input.name: CPI_preL2
input.description: CPI in the core and L1s, from model [9];

input.name: big_core_speed,relative
input.description: big core speed (small core is 1), from model [5];

input.name: chip_area
input.description: base line chip area (in CEAs), from model [4]; total area of the chip for cores and cache, in CEAs, 1 CEA equal to 1MB cache area, from model [9];

input.name: core_bandwidth,GB/s
input.description: bandwidth requirement of the starting cache, from model [6];

input.name: core_count
input.description: base line core number , from model [4]; circular profile file path, from model [9];

input.name: core_area
input.description: area of each core in CEAs, from model [9];

input.name: core_frequency,GB/s
input.description: processor frequency GHz, from model [9];

input.name: tech_node
input.description: please refer to CACTI document, from model [10];

input.name: thread_count
input.description: number of threads, from model [5]; number of threads, from model [7];

input.name: L2_Dcache_access_frequency,million/s
input.description: thread i's access frequency (million/s), from model [7];

input.name: L2_Dcache_miss_penalty
input.description: thread i l2 cache miss penalty, from model [7];

input.name: L2_Dcache_access_frequency,/inst
input.description: L2 accesses per inst , from model [9];

input.name: L2_Dcache_hit_latency,cycles
input.description: L2 access time in cycle, from model [9];

input.name: L2_Dcache_miss_rate
input.description: thread i L2 cache missrate, from model [7]; L2 miss rate for a 1MB L2, from model [9];

input.name: L2_Dcache_block_size
input.description: block size (Bytes), from model [7]; L2 cache block size (Bytes), from model [9];

input.name: cache_size
input.description: starting level(shared) cache size, from model [6]; please refer to CACTI document, from model [10]; please refer to simplescalar document, from model [11];

input.name: cache_block_size
input.description: please refer to CACTI document, from model [10]; please refer to simplescalar document, from model [11];

input.name: cache_assoc_number
input.description: number of associativity, from model [8]; please refer to CACTI document, from model [10]; please refer to simplescalar document, from model [11];

input.name: acapp_replacement_policy_index
input.description: replacement policy index number, from model [2];

input.name: contextswitch_shift_amount
input.description: shift amount, from model [8];

input.name: examdahl_fraction_parallel_outside_critical
input.description: fparn, fraction of parallel part outside critical section, from model [5];

input.name: examdahl_fraction_parallel_inside_critical
input.description: fparc, fraction of parallel part inside critical section, from model [5];

input.name: examdahl_probability_contention
input.description: pctn, contention probability, from model [5];

input.name: fraction_serial
input.description: fraction of program that cannot be parallelized, from model [9];

input.name: factor_memwall_indirect_tech
input.description: factor for indirect technique, from model [4];

input.name: factor_memwall_direct_tech
input.description: factor for direct technique, from model [4];

input.name: factor_memwall_annual_bwgrowth
input.description: bandwidth growth rate per year, from model [4];

input.name: factor_examdahl_ACS_a
input.description: parameter_a, ACS parameter, from model [5];

input.name: factor_examdahl_ACS_b
input.description: parameter_b, ACS parameter, from model [5];

input.name: factor_moguls_tech
input.description: constant determined by process technology, from model [6];

input.name: factor_powerlaw_index
input.description: can use 0.5, from model [4]; , from model [9];

input.name: factor_sharing_impact
input.description: Data sharing impact on miss rates, from model [9];

input.name: file_csq,1
input.description: circular profile file 2 path, from model [1];

input.name: file_csq
input.description: circular profile file path, from model [1]; circular profile file path, from model [2]; circular profile or stack distance profile file path, from model [3]; circular profile file path, from model [8];

input.name: file_benchmark
input.description: please refer to simplescalar document, from model [11];

input.name: memory_bandwidth,B/s
input.description: bandwidth provided by the main memory (Bytes/S), from model [7];

input.name: memory_access_penalty,cycles
input.description: L2 cache access penalty, in number of cycles, from model [9];

input.name: memory_bandwidth,GB/s
input.description: bandwidth provided by the main memory , from model [6]; bandwidth provided by the main memory GB/s, from model [9];
